kun reading compounds: 咎める【とがめる】to blame, to reproach, to censure, to rebuke, to reprove, to find fault, to take to task, to criticize, to criticise, to question (a suspect), to challenge, to aggravate (an injury), to be aggravated, to get inflamed, to prick (one's conscience)
咎【とが】error, mistake, fault, sin, wrongdoing, offense
